mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_REVIEW (SELL_PRODUCT_NUM, USER_NUM, REVIEW_TITLE, REVIEW_CONTENT, REVIEW_DATE) VALUES(#{productNum}, #{userNum}, '', '', now())
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM TBL_REVIEW WHERE REVIEW_TITLE = "" AND USER_NUM=#{userNum}
SELECT * FROM TBL_REVIEW WHERE REVIEW_TITLE != "" AND USER_NUM=#{userNum}

SELECT @ROWNUM := @ROWNUM + 1 AS ROWNUM, T.* FROM TBL_REVIEW T,(SELECT @ROWNUM := 0 ) TMP WHERE SELL_PRODUCT_NUM = #{sellProductNum} and REVIEW_TITLE!='' ORDER BY REVIEW_NUM desc limit #{criteriaProduct.limit},6
SELECT COUNT(SELL_PRODUCT_NUM) FROM TBL_REVIEW WHERE SELL_PRODUCT_NUM = ${sellProductNum}
